daily_challenge_desc: Defeat the {{faction}} General in ONE turn.
challenge_gate_1_desc: Learn mechanics and earn rewards by enjoying these solo challenges.
challenge_gate_2_desc: New solo challenges and rewards! Difficulty: Normal
challenge_gate_3_desc: Embark on more exciting solo challenges! Difficulty: Normal
challenge_gate_4_desc: Another set of fun solo challenges! Difficulty: Normal
challenge_gate_5_desc: You've earned it! Now for some tougher challenges. Difficulty: Hard
challenge_gate_6_desc: Experience the first Trial of Champions. Difficulty: Hard
challenge_gate_7_desc: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe. Difficulty: Hard
challenge_gate_8_desc: The voyage of discovery is not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes. Difficulty: Hard
challenge_gate_9_desc: Created for the community, by the community. Difficulty: Expert
challenge_gate_10_desc: Extremely challenging. Good luck. Difficulty: Insane
beginner_flying_challenge_description: Use FLYING to defeat the Shadowfell General in ONE turn.
beginner_flying_challenge_start: Finish off Shadowfell General in ONE turn!
beginner_flying_challenge_fail: Hint: Keep your Dragonlark alive by boosting its Health.
beginner_flying_challenge_taunt: You still have much to learn!
beginner_ranged_challenge_description: Defeat the Frostborne General in ONE turn.
beginner_ranged_challenge_start: Finish off Frostborne General in ONE turn!
advanced_abyss_1_description: Defeat the Valorguard General in ONE turn.
advanced_abyss_1_start: Finish off Argeon Highmayne in ONE turn!
advanced_abyss_1_fail: Hint: Converge your efforts on the Entangler to succeed.
beginner_abyss_1_description: Use MINION SACRIFICE to defeat the Valorguard General in ONE turn.
beginner_abyss_1_start: Finish off Argeon Highmayne in ONE turn!

beginner_abyss_3_description: Defeat the Sharzy General in ONE turn.
beginner_abyss_3_start: Finish off the Sharzy General in ONE turn!
beginner_abyss_3_fail: Hint: Lure in your enemy to face your dreaded Horn.
beginner_abyss_4_description: Use FRENZY to defeat the Sandshard General in ONE turn.
beginner_abyss_4_start: Finish off the Sandshard General in ONE turn!
beginner_abyss_4_fail: Hint: Tear your enemies apart with Frenzy to clear the way for your Wraithlings.
beginner_abyss_5_description: Use DYING WISH to defeat the Sharzy General in ONE turn.
beginner_abyss_5_start: Finish off the Sharzy General in ONE turn!
beginner_abyss_5_fail: Hint: Have the Void Hunters battle the Bladeseeker to earn their secrets.
beginner_abyss_6_description: Use ENEMY DISPLACEMENT to defeat the Sandshard General in ONE turn.
beginner_abyss_6_start: Finish off the Sandshard General in ONE turn!
beginner_abyss_6_fail: Nothing is beyond our Grasp. Bring forth that Komodo so that I may strike it down and spread its pain among our enemies.
medium_abyss_1_description: Defeat the Valorguard General in ONE turn.
medium_abyss_1_start: Finish off Argeon Highmayne in ONE turn!
medium_abyss_1_fail: Hint: Destroy the Sunstone Templar with your general.

advanced_valorguard_1_start: Finish off the Valorguard General in ONE turn!
advanced_valorguard_1_fail: Hint: Make space to Magnetize the Guardian.

advanced_valorguard_2_start: Finish off the enemy General in ONE turn!
advanced_valorguard_2_fail: Hint: Call back the Guardian to aid in your assault.

beginner_valorguard_1_start: Finish off Calibero in ONE turn!
beginner_valorguard_1_fail: Hint: Clear a path for your Azurite Lion.

beginner_valorguard_2_start: Finish off Vaath the Immortal in ONE turn!
beginner_valorguard_2_fail: Hint: Divine Bond your minion with the highest Health.

beginner_valorguard_3_start: Finish off Vaath the Immortal in ONE turn!
beginner_valorguard_3_fail: Hint: The Shaman's sacrifice brings divine strength to the Sage.

beginner_valorguard_4_start: Finish off Vaath the Immortal in ONE turn!
beginner_valorguard_4_fail: The noblest of warriors must sometimes sacrifice themselves so that their leader may carry on their legacy.

advanced_earthmaw_1_start: Finish off the Sharzy General in ONE turn!
advanced_earthmaw_1_fail: Hint: We already have the Magi on our side. We must now do what it takes to control the Storm Kage.

beginner_earthmaw_2_start: Finish off Faie Bloodwing in ONE turn!

beginner_sharzy_3_start: Finish off the enemy general in ONE turn!

beginner_sharzy_4_fail: Hint: Sneak behind your enemy with Airdrop.
beginner_sharzy_4_taunt: Crushed by the weight of our might!

beginner_sharzy_5_start: Finish off the Valorguard General in ONE turn!
beginner_sharzy_5_fail: My pet hungers to bring down the enemy General. Allow me to match its ferocity against the Knight using the Seal.

medium_sharzy_1_start: Finish off the enemy general in ONE turn!

advanced_frostborne_1_fail: Hint: Acquiring the wisdom of the Sage is key
advanced_frostborne_2_description: Strengthen your walls and turn them to bring down the Sharzy General from Full Health.
advanced_frostborne_2_start: Finish off the Sharzy General in ONE turn!
advanced_frostborne_2_fail: Hint: The might of the Primus is permanent, use it to polarize your defenses.

beginner_frostborne_1_start: Finish off Zirix Starstrider in ONE turn!
